subject: Insurance
Football
lead_paragraph: The former Louisiana State offensive lineman Ciron Black filed a $4 million lawsuit in federal court Friday, saying underwriters at Lloyd’s of London did not pay an insurance policy purchased prior to a career-ending knee injury.
snippet: The former Louisiana State offensive lineman Ciron Black filed a $4 million lawsuit in federal court Friday, saying underwriters at Lloyd’s of London did not pay an insurance policy purchased prior to a career-ending knee injury.
